info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 6:24PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL TAYLOR COUNTY... At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over View, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail reported in View. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... View around 640 PM CDT. Caps around 655 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lake Abilene and Camp Tonkawa. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
